3442.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3409.name: Acolyte's Bedroom
description: This is why you were not welcomed at the entrance by the tomb's faithful
servants ... blood and gore is ankle deep in here.
Oh NO! the door shut behind you!  It's a trap!
A bloodied corpse of an acolyte is lying here ...
A bloodied corpse of an acolyte is lying here ...
A bloodied corpse of an acolyte is lying here ...
Mauled and torn apart ... throats were ripped out and guts spilled on the
floor ... you slip and land, planting yourself firmly in the slick wetness
and splattering yourself with offal.

3468.name: Gilded Hallway
description: Ancient etchings and writing in intricate gold and silver designs fill these
walls.  You are tempted to linger and examine them closely.  Your light source
flickers off the walls showing you exits north and south.
Your light reveals more of the hallway.
Your light reveals more of the hallway.
Beautiful yet disturbing, they urge you to move onward.

3402.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.

3472.name: Short Way to Hell .
description: You fall ...
hmm .... it's getting really HOT!
You fall ...
you fall ...
Slowly you are cooking as you fall further ... your skin is burning and
your hair evaporates ...
you fall ...
and fall ...
and STOP...!!
Welcome to HELL!
But even in Hell we give you another chance.
The fires of hell grow hotter to the north...

3417.name: Grand Hall of Kings
description: This is the western wing of the Grand Hall of Kings.  Your only exits are to
the east and west in this gloomy hallway.

3410.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3420.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3445.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3408.name: Stairwell into Darkness
description: You sense even more danger coming from below but are urged onward ...

3452.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
Too dark to tell.
Too dark to tell.

3470.name: Secret Passageway
description: A secret passage!  You wonder where it may lead!
Too dark to tell.
The door closed on you so softly that you didn't even notice!

3437.name: Grand Hall of Kings
description: You are at the western end of the Grand Hall of Kings.  There is a
door leading north and the hallway continues west.

3448.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: This room has been totally hollowed out and smoothed, and a pit has been
drilled in the center of the floor.  There are extensive gruesome paintings
of beasts and monsters terrorizing the countryside; vampires sucking the
blood of beasts and humans alike.
There is a tiny painting of a vault in this mural ... and it seems to be a
reflected picture of the vault ... the word in tiny print is 'rathcor'.

3418.name: Shrine of Cristis
description: Different than the rest, this place has not been desecrated.  An altar still
stands here and the walls show scenes from the life of Cristis the Kind,
a ruler of the outlying regions west of Westbridge.  There is a stone staircase
leading down.  The Ghost of Cristis the Kind stands here.
It stands 2 feet high with the remnants of candle-wax on top.  There is
an inscription on the side:  'Praise the almighty Cristis the bringer of
good and justice to the world.  He who fought the evilest finally is at
peace.  May the Gods remember him forever ...'
His rest has been disturbed by evil creatures who have invaded his domain
and grave.  He holds up a parchment for you to read:
Hello stranger and last hope for Westbridge and this tomb!
This is a plea for aid by a man long since dead from this Earth.
The forces of evil have taken control of this tomb and the
Kings of old need your aid to free us and deliver us to peace
once again.  I think that I alone have been able to appear and
communicate with the mortal world.
Roch'tar, the reincarnate Vampire, now rules these tombs.
You must find and defeat him and his minions!
May God bless you on your Quest!

3424.name: Tomb of Crotus
description: A sarcophagus lies in the middle of the room and seems undisturbed.
A hole has been knocked into the east wall.

3449.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3459.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
You see something's den.

3413.name: Shrine of Shohan
description: BLOOD EVERYWHERE!
The walls are coated with blood, bits of bloody flesh lie at your feet,
and torn clothing is scattered about.  It wouldn't disturb you in the least
except that it is all FRESH!  What ever used to pass as an altar here,
lies overturned and smashed.  Doors lead to the south and to the north.

3463.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
Too dark to tell.
Too dark to tell.

3435.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3451.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
Too dark to tell.

3462.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
Too dark too tell.
Too dark to tell.

3458.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
You see unfathomable blackness to the south ...

3441.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3466.name: Gilded Hallway
description: Ancient etchings and writing in intricate gold and silver designs fill these
walls.  You are tempted to linger and examine them closely.  Your light source
flickers off the walls showing you exits north and south.
Your light reveals more of the hallway.
Your light reveals more of the hallway.
Beautiful yet disturbing, they urge you to move onward.

3419.name: Tomb of Cristis
description: Everything here has simply been destroyed.   Exits lead north and west.

3439.name: Tomb of Jubal
description: The smell coming off of the opened sarcophagus is nauseating.  The floor is
slightly crumpled and walls are raked ... but the worst part is the mummy ...
Jubal the Benevolent is missing his head!

3453.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
Too dark to tell.

3460.name: Den of the Vampire
description: Your mind whirls in the hideous madness of this place.  The stench
is horrendous and dead bodies, sucked of life, lay all over.  One coffin
lies in the center of the room ... waiting for YOU!
Too dark to tell.
A jet black coffin ... who knows what lurks beneath.

3471.name: Secret Passageway
description: A secret passage!  You wonder where it may lead!
Too dark to tell.

3425.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3469.name: Gilded Hallway
description: Ancient etchings and writing in intricate gold and silver designs fill these
walls.  You are tempted to linger and examine them closely.  Your light source
flickers off the walls showing you exits north.
Your light reveals more of the hallway.
Beautiful yet disturbing, they urge you to move onward.

3403.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.

3438.name: Shrine of Jubal
description: This was once beautiful.  Now the huge tapestries have been torn down and the
carpeting pulled up ... the paintings on the ceiling are unreadable and the
altar is crumbled.

3455.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.

3465.name: Gilded Hallway
description: Wow!  Although this hallway is quite filthy and dusty, it is noticeably
different than the rest of the catacombs ... but you don't feel safe yet.
The walls faintly show ancient detailed etchings in gold and silver of
ancient rituals ... not all of which seem pleasant.  The hallway continues
north into the catacombs and further south as long as you can see.
The glow of your light reflects off the walls and you see the catacombs.
The glow of your light reflects off the walls ... the gilded hallway.
Beautiful yet disturbing, they urge you to move onward.

3446.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3421.name: Entrance to the Hall of Kings
description: Whoever built this place must have been very rich indeed!  Though you did
enter through a rather small door this place has enough room to hold several
score of people.  The floor has a beautifully woven carpet, and the walls are
covered in finely crafted tapestries. You can tell that these things must have
been worth much but they have not lasted well throughout the ages.  Massive
doors lead off to the south and a large stone staircase leads up.
Finely polished oak doors stand to the south.
You see a large set of stone stairs leading upwards to a small stone door at
the top.
'Beware here all of man, because past here lies only death.'
Insho'rkthon brsskra-lehsn Roch'tar
Beneath, there are two criss-crossing scratchmarks in an X formation that
look like someone (or something) raked their claws across the wood.
They're HUGE!  They are at least 12 feet tall and about 10 feet wide.
If not for one thing they would be perfectly preserved.  There appears
to be some letters crudely scratched into the wood.
It's rather small and looks quite heavy but maybe with some kind of leverage
you could move it.  It has a queerly shaped hole that looks big enough
for an equally queerly shaped pole to fit inside.  If only you had it!
The tapestries were woven into beautiful and exciting scenes of battles
long ago.  One on the left your shows the historic battle between Jubal the
Benevolent and Hroth Kragen's forces that eventually Jubal's army won (of
course).
Though quite cracked they do look very stable.

3412.name: Grand Hall of Kings
description: You are at the west end of the Grand Hall of Kings.  There is a doorway to the
south with something strange written above it.  Also on the floor are dried
blood stains, but their color seems a little wrong.
A door to the south
That's odd ... they seem a little GREEN.
Above the door is some strange writing!  It is worn with age, but it refers
to an ancient ruler named 'Shohan'.

3423.name: Shrine of Crotus
description: Mostly rubble, this place used to be the shrine of the famous king Crotus,
who saved the northern regions from being overrun by the goblin hordes of
100 years ago.  If not for him, Westbridge of course would have eventually been
conquered as well.  Though Crotus was a goodly king, it was rumored that he
turned to the dark ways in his dying years ... and died an evil man.

3440.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3454.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
Too dark to tell.

3464.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
Too dark to tell.
Too dark to tell.

3461.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
Too dark to tell.
Too dark to tell.

3422.name: Grand Hall of Kings
description: A long hallway stretches east and west.  On the southern side of the hall
there are many doors, each with the name of a king who has died and is
entombed here.  The hallway is beautiful yet chilling.  Even though the area
has been kept well by acolytes, there remains a stench of the undead.
The door has written above it: 'May all the lands thank Crotus the Victor.
Without his guidance this kingdom would not have stood.'

3411.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3434.name: Tomb of Frath
description: UGH!  The sarcophagus is opened up and the mummified body lies out in the
open, ripped to pieces.  Gnawed pieces of flesh and bone are strewn here.

3426.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3405.name: Inside the Chapel
description: You are in a small, dark chapel.  The dark brown glass in the tiny windows
do not let much light through.  A few rows of worn wooden benches stand here.
The benches are not of the comfortable kind.
The windows must be meant to be dark.  At least they are completely clean.

3436.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3430.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3447.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3414.name: Tomb of Shohan
description: Once beautiful, this place has been turned into a slaughterhouse by the hands
of evil beings ... even more blood and dead, rotting flesh.  This place looks
like the feeding grounds of beasts and monsters.  The overturned sarcophagus
of the once powerful King Shohan lies here.  A door leads to the north and a
doorway has been hewn to the east.
Now destroyed ... there is writing on it: 'All hail the new king; we serve
the Roch'tar, the Undying One!  Those who decline his worship shall be
slaughtered!'

3431.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3401.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.

3416.name: Entrance to the Lower Chambers
description: You can tell that this area wasn't a part of the original construction.
The walls have been hewn by a mighty force look as though they were CLAWED.
The passage slopes upward here and also continues to the north.
Something BIG must have done this job!  There are traces of BLOOD in the
claw marks.

3432.name: Grand Hall of Kings
description: You are still walking through the gloomy hallway.

3450.name: Descent to the Forbidden Catacombs
description: You have entered the forbidden catacombs.  This cave system must have been
built long ago.  The air is dank and smells of something dead ...  or maybe
undead.  Enter here at your own risk ... something evil abides.
Too dark to tell.
Too dark to tell.
Too dark to tell.
Too dark to tell.

3433.name: Shrine of Frath
description: Little chunks of dried meat are spattered throughout this room.  The walls
are covered in gore.  Almost as if they were painted ... ICK!  You can
almost make out the design!

3415.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3429.name: Tomb of Mitnar
description: The wall paintings show men and women warriors alike bowing down to Mitnar,
prisoners of war being put to the sword by Mitnar, and great heaps of gold
and weapons under the feet of Mitnar.  Where his coffin was, there is now
only a rectangular blemish on the floor of the dusty room.

3456.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
Too dark to tell.

3467.name: Gilded Hallway
description: Ancient etchings and writing in intricate gold and silver designs fill these
walls.  You are tempted to linger and examine them closely.  Your light source
flickers off the walls showing you exits north and south.
Your light reveals more of the hallway.
Your light reveals more of the hallway.
Beautiful yet disturbing, they urge you to move onward.

3457.name: Catacombs
description: Stone walls, musty air ... the earth seems to moan softly.
Too dark to tell.
Too dark to tell.

3427.name: Grand Hall of Kings
description: You are in the western part of the Grand Hall of Kings.  To the south is a
door and to the east and west the hall continues.

3444.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3443.name: Lower Chambers of the Undead
description: The stench of death is heavy in these caverns.

3428.name: Shrine of Mitnar
description: Mitnar was a gruesome beast of a man ... he loved battle ... and nothing
else.  Warriors did love Mitnar, and all fighting men honored him.
On the wall is depicted battle after battle after battle.
A small opening has been shaped carefully to the east.

3400.name: the bony skeleton~
description:
Brown bones with tufts of clothing still hanging from them.  This
skeleton looks very mindless but still dangerous ...

3401.name: the undead zombie~
description:
His body is totally white and slowly rotting away.  Each Zombie looks
quite different from the next because they were, of course, once alive and
human.
3401.room_name: An undead zombie sits here munching on something ...

3402.name: The ghoul~
description:
The ghoul no longer resembles the adventurer he once was.  Nonetheless
he looks like he hasn't forgot his fighting skills.
3402.room_name: A ghoul is here staring at you hungrily.

3403.name: The wraith~
description:
The wraith no longer has a material form.  He is wearing a tattered
black robe which hides all but the darkness of his face and the glimmer
in his eyes.
3403.room_name: You spot a wraith advancing towards you from the shadows.

3404.name: The guardian vampire~
description:
The guardian vampire looks quite EVIL.  Just by looking at him the hair on your
arms raises. He looks mighty tough to be just a minor minion.
3404.room_name: A vampire is here hiding his face from your light source.

3405.name: the priest~
description:
Obviously a goodly man, you feel closer to God just by gazing upon this man.
Dressed in white, fine white hair, and a soft slightly wrinkled face ...
this man has a sacred beauty.  You see a halo around his head.
3405.room_name: A priest of God stands here solemnly speaking words of praise.

3406.name: the Mi-Go~
description:
Mi-Go, the Fungi from Yuggoth ... it is a pinkish being about five feet long;
with a crustaceous body bearing a vast pair of membranous wings and several
sets of articulate limbs, body a sort of convoluted ellipsoid, covered with
multitudes of very small antennae, where a head would ordinarily be.  These
beings sometimes walk on all their legs and sometimes on the hind pair only.

3407.name: The nightgaunt~
description:
... shocking and uncouth black thing with smooth, oily, skin, unpleasant horns
that curve inward toward each other, bat wings whose beating make no sound,
ugly prehensile paws, and a barbed tail that lashes disquietingly.  And worst
of all, it makes absolutely no sound or speech and smiles not at all because
it has no face, only a suggestive blackness where a face ought to be ...

3408.name: The hunting horror~
description:
Serving Nyarlathotep and Roch'tar, these beings are hunting for victims.
They resemble enormous ropy black serpents or worms possessing bat-like or
umbrella-like wings.  Their forms continually shift and change, twitching
and writhing, so it is hard to look at them.  They speak in great harsh
voices.  A hunting horror is HUGE, normally around 40 feet long.
3408.room_name: The hunting horror is here in wait of an unwary traveler.

3409.name: some cave weeds~
description: Just some unpleasant looking vine-like growths ...
3409.room_name: Some weeds are creeping across the floor.

3410.name: Snapper Joe~
description:
What an ugly fiend! He is about 6'6'' and has mostly greenish skin with
bright red hair. Half his face is burnt off and he has a perpetual smile.
He is called up from his service in hell in order to aid the Undying One.
3410.room_name: Snapper Joe is standing here leering at you chillingly.

3411.name: The X-ist flesh eater~
description:
A large hairy monstrous beast, the only LIVE thing you have seen down here.
It stands approximately 8 feet tall and hunches over to fit in this
small room.  It has a pair of tremendous claws that it uses to rip and tear.
It has dog-like face except ... different.  Bright glowing eyes and a grimace
lead you to believe that he knew that you were coming.
3411.room_name: An X-ist flesh eater is sitting here munching on some coffin remains

3412.name: the spirit of King Crotus~
description:
Floating above the ground here and looking a bit dead, he whispers
softly into the air:

    The forces of evil have unlocked my spirit as
    well as one other.  Free me from this misery,
    anyone that can hear. The peace of the grave
    calls me but I am blocked from its quiet.
3412.room_name: The spirit of King Crotus is floating lazily above the floor.

3413.name: the rock slug~
description: It is a large brownish slug.  Got any salt?  Didn't think so ...
3413.room_name: A rock slug is slowly creeping along, leaving a slime trail behind it.

3414.name: The mad etcher~
description:
Quite insane, the mad etcher has been here for two decades.  His hair is
white; he babbles nonsense to himself; a layer of dust covers his out-of-date
clothing; and he seems to be working on the same portion of the wall near
the base ... oh and he seems quite blind.

He leers insanely at you and says 'heh heh what can I do for you children?
Please don't mind my wife, she is always like that ... hello dear can you
make some tea for our company?  Oh good!  Now sit right down will you?
Would you like hot or cold tea?  Yes the weather is ...'

And on he babbles ...
3414.room_name: The mad etcher is sitting here babbling to himself and working on the wall.

3415.name: The spectral etcher's wife~
description:
You can barely make her out ... though it almost makes you vomit.
She is missing half her head.  The remaining half is smashed in horribly like
she took a nasty fall.  Her one damaged eye hangs on its own.  She smiles
insanely at you thru a broken jaw and missing teeth.  One hand of hers is
resting on the shoulder of the etcher ... her husband.
3415.room_name: The spectral wife of the etcher is very faintly floating here.

3416.name: The half-decomposed body~
description: YUK! It's ugly, disgusting ... it smells ... it also moves a bit!
3416.room_name: A half-decomposed body is lying in the corner here.
